name: office-to-markdown
title: Office to Markdown Converter
description: Extract Word and PowerPoint documents to Markdown format
content:
Overview

This application extracts content from Microsoft Word (.docx) and PowerPoint (.pptx) documents and converts them to Markdown format. Built using python-docx, python-pptx, and pypandoc, it preserves text structure and formatting.

Features

  • Convert Word documents (.docx) to Markdown
  • Convert PowerPoint presentations (.pptx) to Markdown
  • Preserve headings and text structure
  • Automatic slide-by-slide conversion for PowerPoint
  • Fallback extraction methods for compatibility

Parameters

  • Office File: Upload your Word (.docx) or PowerPoint (.pptx) file
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the Markdown output

Output

The application generates a Markdown file named {original_name}.md containing the extracted and formatted content.

Conversion Details

  • Word Documents: Preserves headings, paragraphs, and basic formatting using pypandoc with fallback to basic extraction
  • PowerPoint Presentations: Each slide becomes a section with slide number as heading, bullet points preserved

Use Cases

  • Converting documents to version-control-friendly format
  • Extracting presentation content for documentation
  • Creating Markdown versions of Office documents
  • Content migration and archival
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$PPID"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/office_to_markdown.py" "${inputPath}" -o "${outputDir}"
